author: USA TODAY, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Cloth masks in public recommended; US retailers limit store access; FEMA sends medical supplies
description: As the nation continues to grapple with the crisis, retailers are limiting how many shoppers can enter stores to encourage social distancing.
content:
The U.S. death toll from the coronavirus marched to another record-setting pace early Saturday, with nearly 1,200 deaths in 24 hours as federal emergency workers tried to answer desperate pleas for respirators from dozens of states.
Many traditions of Americ… [+6466 chars]
